    • Method Detail

      • allowGetItems

        public boolean allowGetItems(TaggableActivity activity,
                    TaggingProvider provider,
                    boolean allowGetItems,
                    String taggedItem)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to check if the current user can get all of the items for an activity.
        Specified by:
        allowGetItems in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity that contains the items.
        provider - The provider that is checking for permission.
        allowGetItems - This flag will return only items where the owner matches userId
        taggedItem - Reference to an item that can be used for additional permission lookups
        Returns:
        True if the current user can get all of the items for the given activity, false otherwise.

      • allowRemoveTags

        public boolean allowRemoveTags(TaggableActivity activity)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to determine if the current user has permission to remove tags from the given activity. This should be checked by TaggingProvider.removeTags(TaggableActivity) before removing tags. While TaggingProvider objects determine tagging access given an activity, the producer has control over who can remove the activity (ex. deletion) and, therefore, who can remove tags from the activity.
        Specified by:
        allowRemoveTags in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity to check permission against.
        Returns:
        True if the current user is allowed to delete the specified activity, false otherwise.

      • allowRemoveTags

        public boolean allowRemoveTags(TaggableItem item)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to determine if the current user has permission to remove tags from the given item. This should be checked by TaggingProvider.removeTags(TaggableItem) before removing tags. While TaggingProvider objects determine tagging access given an item, the producer has control over who can remove the item (ex. deletion) and, therefore, who can remove tags from the item.
        Specified by:
        allowRemoveTags in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check permission against.
        Returns:
        True if the current user is allowed to delete the specified item, false otherwise.

      • allowTransferCopyTags

        public boolean allowTransferCopyTags(TaggableActivity activity)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to determine if the current user has permission to copy tags from one activity to another, as would happen during EntityTransferrer.transferCopyEntities(String, String, List). This should be checked by TaggingProvider.transferCopyTags(TaggableActivity, TaggableActivity) before copying tags. We want tags to be copied when activities are duplicated, but only want to do so if the current user is allowed to copy the activities.
        Specified by:
        allowTransferCopyTags in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity to check permission against.
        Returns:
        True if the current user is allowed to copy the specified activity, false otherwise.

      • checkReference

        public boolean checkReference(String ref)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to check if this producer handles the given reference.
        Specified by:
        checkReference in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        ref - A reference for an object produced by a taggable activity producer.
        Returns:
        True if this producer handles the reference, false otherwise.

      • getActivities

        public List<TaggableActivity> getActivities(String context,
                                   TaggingProvider provider)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to get a list of all taggable activities within the given context.
        Specified by:
        getActivities in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        context - The context to search.
        provider - The provider that is getting the activities. This allows the producer to selectively return different lists of activities depending on the given provider.
        Returns:
        A list, possibly empty, of all taggable activities within the given context.

      • getActivity

        public TaggableActivity getActivity(String activityRef,
                           TaggingProvider provider)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to get a taggable activity by reference string.
        Specified by:
        getActivity in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        activityRef - A reference for the taggable activity.
        provider - The provider that is getting the activity. This allows the producer to selectively return an activity, or none at all, depending on the given provider.
        Returns:
        The taggable activity, or null if no such activity exists or the provider cannot access it.

      • getItem

        public TaggableItem getItem(String itemRef,
                   TaggingProvider provider,
                   boolean getMyItemsOnly,
                   String taggedItem)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to get a taggable item by reference string.
        Specified by:
        getItem in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        itemRef - The reference for the taggable item.
        provider - The provider that is getting the item. This allows the producer to selectively return an item, or none at all, depending on the given provider.
        getMyItemsOnly - This flag will return only items where the owner matches userId
        taggedItem - Reference to an item that can be used for additional permission lookups
        Returns:
        The taggable item, or null if no such item exists or the provider cannot access it.

      • getItems

        public List<TaggableItem> getItems(TaggableActivity activity,
                          String userId,
                          TaggingProvider provider,
                          boolean getMyItemsOnly,
                          String taggedItem)
        Description copied from interface: TaggableActivityProducer
        Method to get a list of items belonging to a specific user for an activity.
        Specified by:
        getItems in interface TaggableActivityProducer
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity that contains the items to retrieve.
        userId - The identifier of the user who submitted the items for the given activity.
        provider - The provider that is getting the items. This allows the producer to selectively return different lists of items depending on the given provider.
        getMyItemsOnly - This flag will return only items where the owner matches userId
        taggedItem - Reference to an item that can be used for additional permission lookups
        Returns:
        A list of items submitted by the specified user for the given activity.

      • getItems

        public List<TaggableItem> getItems(TaggableActivity activity,

        provider - The provider that is getting the items. This allows the producer to selectively return different lists of items depending on the given provider.
        getMyItemsOnly - This flag will return only items where the owner matches userId
        taggedItem - Reference to an item that can be used for additional permission lookups
        Returns:
